sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './about.css' function About() { return (

Project

This page is for our web-games project. In here, we provide important project documentation and links to documents. Below we provide a short description of the project and its progress.

Our idea is to create a website that has some simple mini-games, which the player can choose and play from the browser. The goal of the games are that they have easy learning curve but very hard to play and earn higher scores so that the players keep playing and improving their scores. Player scores will then be upload to our database and the top players will have their name shown on the main page.

Project group

The members of our group are as follow:

  • Enock Kipkoech
  • Mwenda Murithi
  • Asher Areba

Design

This is our Requirements Specification Document, changes and update will be made as the project progress..

This is our Software Design Document, changes and update will be made as the project progress..

Project meetings

Meeting 2013-05-08

We created 3 games with Javascript, the graphics aren't good but the core gameplay is done. We also created the basic layout of the website as well as the basic database

Meeting 2013-05-16

We created a working database that records the players scores on some game, more server side fucntion will be added to the games later. One game will be created with GameMaker Studio, an Object-Oriented programming language.

Meeting 2013-05-23

...

Project results

Here you can put link(s) to the final and/or intermediate versions of your application.

This is the browser version of Lord of the Galaxy, one of our many games.

This is the download link to the installer for the client version of Lord of the Galaxy

) } export default About
